1.title: Volcom Pipe Pro
1.plot: The world's best surfers return to Oahu, Hawaii and the world-famous Banzai Pipeline for another year of high-profile, high-stakes contest surfing.

2.title: Hare Scramble
2.plot: The crown jewel of the Erzbergrodeo weekend's proceedings is the Red Bull Hare Scramble where 500 dirt bikers claw their way from the quarry of an operational iron mine to try to conquer the Austrian mountain known as the Iron Giant.

3.title: Roller Coaster
3.plot: Red Bull Roller Coaster is a slopestyle course with 12 unique obstacles in the hills of Olympiapark in Munich. At nearly 300m long with a vertical drop of 12m, the athletes execute some serious skateboarding action.

4.title: Straight Rhythm
4.plot: The 2018 battle of the bumps sees Supercross racers on 250cc two-stroke bikes taking on a half-mile 'unwound' track featuring jumps and whoops at Fairplex's Grandstand in Pomona, California.

5.title: Rampage
5.plot: The red rocks of Virgin, Utah will once again host the biggest test of guts, skill and creativity in mountain biking. An elite group of 21 riders will bring their best man-made lines into the 13th edition of Red Bull Rampage.

6.title: Burton U.S. Open
6.plot: Action from the Burton U.S. Open Snowboarding Championships at Vail, Colorado.

1.title: Crashed Ice: Saint Paul, Minnesota
1.plot: America will be seeing the toughest, fastest ice cross downhill racers from around the world race through an unforgiving and gritty downhill ice canal course full of mind-and-body-bending twists, turns in Saint Paul, Minnesota.

2.title: Crashed Ice: Valkenburg
2.plot: Red Bull Crashed Ice world tour is under way and bringing downhill ice cross into your living room. Check out the full episode of the last stop in Valkenburg.

3.title: Crashed Ice: Sweden
3.plot: We stop in the ski resort village of Aare, Sweden for the third stop of the Red Bull Crashed Ice World Tour. The competitors face the fastest track to date and we see one of the biggest upsets in Crashed Ice history.

4.title: Red Bull Cold Rush 2012 - Backcountry Ski Competition
4.plot: What happens when you give some of the best skiers access to a helicopter at Silverton Mountain with chutes and cliffs? You get Red Bull Cold Rush. Enter one of the most progressive all rider judged back country ski competitions where anything can happen.

5.title: Daron Rahlves Banzai Tour
5.plot: The big mountain free skiing-meets-skier event, concluded at Sugar Bowl Resort. The event featured head-to-head action with four competitors racing at the same time on a natural-terrain course that happened to have zero visibility because of a snowstorm.

6.title: Red Bull Supernatural
6.plot: Red Bull Supernatural is a first-of-its-kind, back country snowboard competition challenging riders all around skill level. Watch the worlds most notable up-and-comers alongside the icons of snowboarding progress the sport to a whole new level.

7.title: Amateur vs. Pro Freestyle Skiing: Red Bull Dumont Cup
7.plot: Watch the young shredders of freestyle skiing get the opportunity to compete head to head with some of the sports top professional athletes at the Red Bull Dumont Cup. Perfect weather and full sized features greet the competitors in Sunday River.

8.title: Crashed Ice: Quebec
8.plot: Catch the best of the action as Canadas Kyle Croxall goes all in at the Ice Cross Downhill World Championship in Quebec City in front of 100,000 spectators. Hold on to your skates as this course is faster and even steeper than before.

9.title: Red Bull X Fighters Dubai
9.plot: Welcome to the 2012 Season Opener for the world-renown freestyle motocross competition series: Red Bull X-Fighters. A competition that has made history time and time again, the X-Fighters in Dubai promises to progress the sport to the next level.

10.title: X-Fighters USA
10.plot: Watch as riders try and conquer the biggest FMX track in the 11-year X-Fighters history.

11.title: Nike Lowers Pro
11.plot: With 96 competitors and $250,000 on the line - Nike Lowers Pro at Lower Trestles sorts out some of the most innovative and progressive surfers.

12.title: Red Bull Wake Open
12.plot: Approximately 25,000 amazed spectators lined the Garrison Channel at the Tampa Convention Center, watching 40 of the world's top wake boarders compete in a three-day event that showcased tremendous talent in Park, Boat, and Big Air competitions.

13.title: Red Bull Hare Scramble 2012
13.plot: Red Bull Hare Scramble is considered the climax of the Erzburg Rodeo. The world's top hard enduro riders are put to the test as they battle rain, mud, and rocks to try to accomplish the rare feat of making it past the finish line.

14.title: X Fighters World Tour 2012 Madrid
14.plot: New Zealand's Levi Sherwood battled against Spain's Dany Torres and Maikel Melero in front of a pulsating crowd of 20,000 frenzied Spaniards at the Madrid stop of the Red Bull X-Fighters $1 million World Tour.

15.title: US Open of Surfing 2012
15.plot: Watch as the World's best surfers look to cement themselves in the history books at the most iconic surfing competition on the planet, the US Open of Surfing, taking place in the always sunny Huntington Beach, California.

16.title: X-Fighters Munich 2012
16.plot: The world's best Freestyle Motocross tour made its first-ever stop in Munich for the Red Bull X-Fighters World Tour. The world's top FMX riders invaded the Bavarian capital and performed breathtaking tricks in Munich's famous Olympic Stadium.

17.title: Romaniacs 2012
17.plot: Check out Red Bull Romaniacs Hard Enduro Rallye 2012, one of the most extreme enduro off-road motocross races in the world. Taking place in Romania, see if reigning champ Graham Jarvis has what it takes to win the competition yet again.

18.title: Red Bull Joyride 2012
18.plot: The level of difficulty of the Red Bull Joyride course and the high level of talent that competed blew away the judges and the crowd all night long in Whistler, BC. Don't miss any of the action from the ultimate downhill mountain biking competition.

19.title: X-Fighters Sydney 2012
19.plot: Levi Sherwood was the dominant force of the $1 million Red Bull X-Fighters 2012 World Tour but the New Zealander needed a brilliant performance in the final showdown in Sydney against Tom Pages to prevail in the closest championship battle ever.

20.title: Enduro Motocross in the Middle East: Red Bull Sea to Sky
20.plot: 136 riders from 20 countries gathered on the beaches of Kemer, Turkey to battle for glory at the Red Bull Sea to Sky Enduro motocross race. The technical race starts at the beach and ascends through rough, wet, and steep terrain to an elevation of 2365m.

21.title: Loretta Lynn's
21.plot: Racing has come to a close after five consecutive days at the historic Loretta Lynn Ranch in Hurricane Mills, Tenn. Over the weekend, 36 National Champions were crowned in the 31st running of the 2012 Red Bull AMA Amateur National Motocross Championship.

22.title: Rampage 2012
22.plot: Red Bull Rampage - unforgiving, scary, treacherous - and the best event of the year for free ride mountain bikers. From the building to the buildup, check out all the action from the iconic event, taking place in the desolate area of Virgin, Utah.

23.title: TORC Off Road Truck Championship
23.plot: Check out all the action from the Super Bowl of off road truck racing, TORC. Taking place in Crandon Wisconsin, watch as drivers Ricky Johnson, Bryce Menzies, and Robby Gordon battle it out for a podium finish at the Crandon Cup.

1.title: Crashed Ice Niagara Falls
1.plot: The Red Bull Crashed Ice season kicks off in Niagara Falls against the breathtaking natural backdrop of the magnificent falls. The ice cross downhill competition will host 80,000 people in the most thrilling and heart-pumping sporting event.

2.title: Crashed Ice Saint Paul
2.plot: Red Bull Crashed Ice Saint Paul witnessed the closest final in the 13-year history of the sport.

3.title: Ultra Natural
3.plot: Red Bull Ultra Natural - the ultra-progressive snowboard competition evolves once again as Travis Rice and 15 of the world's top riders prepare to drop into the ultimate course designed to crown the world's best all-around snowboarder.

4.title: Playstreets 2013
4.plot: Inner city slope style madness in the idyllic Austrian town of Bad Gastein. Some of the world's best riders showcased their skills on road gaps, wall drops and roof rails in a unique free ski contest. Tune in to the 2013 edition of Red Bull Playstreets.

5.title: Wake Open 2013
5.plot: The renowned Red Bull Wake Open returned to the shores of Tampa, Florida, as the three-day event showcased talent from nine countries in boat, big air and park. Watch as the top riders battled it out to be crowned the best all-around wake boarder.

6.title: Volcom Fiji Pro
6.plot: The ASP's Volcom Fiji Pro is recognized as one of the most prestigious surf events on the planet. The contest is held at Cloudbreak, where the infamous wedge serves up waves that are close to perfect. Watch as the world's best surfers battle it out.

7.title: Loretta Lynn's 2013
7.plot: Racing has come to a close after five consecutive days at the historic Loretta Lynn Ranch in Hurricane Mills, Tenn. Over the weekend, 36 National Champions were crowned in the 32nd running of the 2013 Red Bull AMA Amateur National Motocross Championship.

8.title: Oakley Pro Bali 2013
8.plot: The world's top 34 surfers compete on Bali's eastern shore. Hosted at Keramas, this is the first time that its reef break was sanctioned as an ASP Tour event. With barrel, turn and air sections, it's arguably the most high-performance wave on the Tour.

9.title: Joyride 2013
9.plot: Watch the world's most progressive free ride mountain bikers on their annual pilgrimage to Whistler. Top professionals compete on a rider-inspired downhill course featuring dirt jumps, ramps, and a massive drop off the notorious Joyride cabin.

10.title: TORC Off Road Truck Racing 2013
10.plot: The Traxxas series showcases adrenaline-fueled driving characteristic of off road racing. The event combines the most powerful machines with the best drivers in the nation, as they try their hand at racing the 900hp short course battle trucks.

11.title: Vans US Open of Surfing 2013
11.plot: The Vans US Open of Surfing was held at the iconic Huntington Beach pier in Surf City, USA, as the world's top surfers competed for a shot at the podium. Pro surfers Alejo Muniz and Carissa Moore put on a show to remember for the fans of SoCal.

12.title: Dreamline 2013
12.plot: Put the world's best BMX dirt jumpers and trail riders on one of the most amazing dirt contest courses ever built, and you get top-notch, progressive riding and a hell of a good time. This is Red Bull Dreamline, the biggest dirt jump contest of 2013.

13.title: Hare Scramble 2013
13.plot: Red Bull Hare Scramble is considered the climax of the Erzburg Rodeo. The world's top hard enduro riders are put to the test as they battle rain, mud, and rocks to try to accomplish the rare feat of making it past the finish line.

14.title: Rampage 2013
14.plot: On a gusty day in Southern Utah, a group of 25 daring mountain bikers blew the doors off what is possible on two wheels, unleashing some of the biggest moments the sport has ever seen. Watch history be made at Red Bull Rampage 2013.

1.title: Frozen Rush
1.plot: Red Bull Frozen Rush was the world's first-ever off-road truck race on snow. Eight 900-horsepower Pro-4 trucks and the best drivers in the world, including athletes Ricky Johnson and Bryce Menzies, hit the slopes in front of 10,000 fans.

2.title: Double Pipe
2.plot: For the first time ever, two competition-spec half pipes were constructed side-by-side. Watch as 16 of the world's best snowboarders test their hand on the two perfectly groomed half pipes in Aspen.

4.title: Mint 400
4.plot: With a 400-mile course through the unrelenting Nevada desert, it's no wonder the Mint 400 is considered the most prestigious off-road race event in America. Watch the big shooters show down on the cruel battlefield.

5.title: Hare Scramble 2014
5.plot: With the Iron Giant basking in near-perfect weather conditions, the 500-rider entry blasted off the quarry floor start line under clear bright skies. From the start it was clear that Jonny Walker was determined to win.

6.title: Mavericks Invitational
6.plot: On the biggest and perfect day of the winter, Mavericks lived up to its ferocious reputation and gave the best big-wave surfers in the world a contest deserving of their mettle and might. This is the Mavericks Invitational.

7.title: Joyride
7.plot: The many worlds of mountain biking will collide in one of the largest and most anticipated free ride competitions of the year. Fusing elements of slope style, dirt jump and classic downhill biking, check out Red Bull Joyride in Whistler, BC.

8.title: Cape Fear
8.plot: Cape Fear. The name says it all. And for the uninitiated, it's a deadly wave break in Sydney, Australia that is even more daunting than it sounds. Twelve surfers, will be tasked with the ultimate challenge, a one-on-one Red surfing battle.

9.title: Romaniacs
9.plot: The longest hard enduro race of the season is BACK with more rugged terrain then ever. Red Bull Romaniacs 2014 brought together the world's best extreme enduro riders in a head to head race across hundreds of kilometers in the Romanian countryside.

10.title: Dreamline
10.plot: Galdiators, mixed with warriors, mixed with champions, mixed with legends - everything you get, at Dreamline. Pitting the best in BMX against each other on the one of the craziest dirt courses seen in competition.

11.title: District Ride
11.plot: Red Bull District Ride went down in Nuremberg's old town, where the world's top free ride mountain bike athletes took to the sky in an epic display of slope style MTB progression through the city.

13.title: Rampage
13.plot: The great equalizer of all mountain bike events, Red Bull Rampage brought together the best slope style riders, downhill racers and natural-terrain free riders for one big-mountain test of all-around bike skill on the near-vertical sandstone ridges of Virgi.

1.title: Frozen Rush
1.plot: Red Bull Frozen Rush was the world's first-ever off-road truck race on snow. Eight 900-horsepower Pro-4 trucks and the best drivers in the world, including athletes Ricky Johnson and Bryce Menzies, hit the slopes in front of 10,000 fans.

2.title: Double Pipe
2.plot: Last season, Red Bull Double Pipe pushed the limits of half pipe snowboarding, building the first ever side-by-side super pipes to challenge the world's best snowboarders. Now, the competition returns to Aspen with an updated course design.

3.title: Volcom Pipe Pro
3.plot: The best surfers from around the globe come together to test their skills on Hawaii's heaviest barrel and the world's most humbling wave as part of the Volcom Pipe Pro. Watch as local legends and favorites fall victim to Pipeline's unforgiving power.

4.title: Simple Session
4.plot: Once just a local competition, Simple Session has now developed to become one of the biggest indoor BMX contests in the world. It regularly draws some of the best Park and Street riders from across the world.

5.title: Mint 400
5.plot: The 2015 Polaris RZR Mint 400 presented by General Tire, is referred to as the \"Greatest Off-Road Race in America.\" Taking place in the desert outside of Las Vegas, Nevada, an all-out 400-mile race.

6.title: Hart Lines
6.plot: From Detroit's Hart Plaza comes a brand new street skateboarding competition from the mind of Ryan Sheckler. Red Bull Hart Lines sets out to produce a high-energy skateboard event featuring an innovative new contest format.

7.title: Vans Pool Party
7.plot: Watch the biggest names in bowl skateboarding battling it out in the legendary Combi bowl at the Vans Skatepark in Orange, California for the 10th anniversary of the revered Vans Pool Party.

8.title: Hare Scramble
8.plot: Part cluster of tricky enduro races, part four-day party, if you only get yourself to one event on the 2015 Hard Enduro calendar, make it the Erzbergrodeo.

9.title: Joyride
9.plot: Red Bull Joyride marks its 5th anniversary at Crankworx Whistler in 2015. Fusing elements of slope style, dirt jump and North Shore-style mountain biking, Red Bull Joyride melts together natural terrain with gravity-fed man-made features.

10.title: Romaniacs
10.plot: Set in the Carpathian Mountains, Red Bull Romaniacs is the longest race of the Hard Enduro season. It starts with a brutal scramble through the streets of Sibiu and then moves into 4 days of racing through terrain that would make a mountain goat sweat.

11.title: Straight Rhythm
11.plot: An evolution of the sport of super cross, Red Bull Straight Rhythm features an "unwound\" track, where there are no turns, just a 1/2 mile-long straight rhythm section.

12.title: O'Neill Coldwater Classic
12.plot: The O'Neill Coldwater Classic is a pillar of competitive surfing. Held at the arena-like break, Steamer Lane in Santa Cruz, California, the venue only adds to the drama as the world's best surfers battle it out.

13.title: Rampage
13.plot: Red Bull Rampage brought together the best slope style riders, downhill racers and natural-terrain free riders for one big-mountain test of all-around bike skill on the near-vertical sandstone ridges of Virgin, Utah.

1.title: Frozen Rush
1.plot: For the third year in a row, the sound of 900-horsepower off-road trucks echo through the mountains of Maine as Red Bull Frozen Rush returns to Sunday River Resort.

2.title: Volcom Pipe Pro
2.plot: The Volcom Pipe Pro is the contest at Pipeline that serves as the \"Proving Ground\" for surfers looking to make their name in the scene. Over a hundred surf warriors will battle on the iconic wave in the hopes of winning worldwide glory and respect.

3.title: Hart Lines
3.plot: Ryan Sheckler's Detroit Invitational is a throwback to authentic street skateboarding with a twist. Held at famous skate spot Hart Plaza, top skateboarders throw down their best tricks across two unique courses, all while racing against the clock.

4.title: Hare Scramble
4.plot: From a field of hundreds, it's now up to the finalists to conquer this daunting course. After last year's historic four-way tie between Alfredo Gómez, Jonny Walker, Graham Jarvis and Andreas Lettenbichler, this year's final has a lot to live up to.

5.title: Crandon World Cup
5.plot: History will be made as the world's best racers are crowned in the inaugural off-road World Cup. The level of driving talent present in Crandon promises to deliver one of the most thrilling motor sports competitions of all time.

6.title: Mint 400
6.plot: The Great American Off-Road Race runs wild on the desert outside Las Vegas. Drivers blast 1000hp trucks and buggies through three, brutal, 125-mile (200km) laps at speeds reaching over 100mph hoping to etch their name in the history books with a win.

7.title: Joyride
7.plot: Joyride ups the ante in free ride mountain biking yet again with a course that is bigger, longer, and more technical than ever. The fans expect a Brandon Semenauk/Brett Rheeder showdown, but a slew of rookies are ready to show the world what's next.

8.title: Rampage
8.plot: The pinnacle of free ride mountain biking contests returns to the Utah desert with a new format, a new venue, and new features that will once again raise the bar in a sport that's always pushing the limits. 2016 will be the most intense Rampage yet.

9.title: Straight Rhythm
9.plot: The third battle of the bumps is back at Fariplex in Pomona and this time the finals go down under the lights on a half-mile "unwound" supercross track. James Stewart tries to defend his 2015 title against the hard-charging challengers.

1.title: Crashed Ice Saint Paul
1.plot: The world's toughest skaters battle four at a time in an all-out ice cross downhill race in St. Paul.

2.title: Crashed Ice Ottawa
2.plot: The world's toughest skaters battle four at a time in an all-out ice cross downhill race in Ottawa.

3.title: Volcom Pipe Pro

imdb.plot outline: From the challenging peaks of the Canadian back country to the sandstone cliffs of Utah, The Red Bull Signature Series unleashes the most progressive and innovative competitions around the globe. The Series spans the sports of snowboarding, mountain biking, freestyle motocross, ice cross downhill, skiing and BMX events on custom courses from the inspiration of the athletes themselves.
imdb.title: Red Bull Signature Series
plot: From the challenging peaks of the Canadian back country to the sandstone cliffs of Utah, The _Red Bull Signature Series_ (qv) unleashes the most progressive and innovative competitions around the globe. The Series spans the sports of snowboarding, mountain biking, freestyle motocross, ice cross downhill, skiing and BMX events on custom courses from the inspiration of the athletes themselves.
